= High throughput sequencing data analysis =

== Calculating gene expression ==

Align transcriptome sequencing reads against the reference genome using Tophat:
{{{
    mkdir ../tophat_alignments
    echo *_1.fq.gz | parallel -n3 -c8 -m20 \
        'tophat2 -p8 -o ../tophat_alignments/${x%_1.fq.gz} --transcriptome-index ~/tools/tophat-indexes/homo_sapiens/iGenome_37.2_NCBI ~/tools/bowtie2-indexes/homo_sapiens/hg19 $x ${x%_1.fq.gz}_2.fq.gz'

cd ~/datasets/bova_metastasis/rna-seq/tophat_alignments
for x in *_L1; do mv $x/unmapped.bam unmapped/${x/_L1/}.bam; done
for x in *_L1; do mv $x/accepted_hits.bam ${x/_L1/}.bam; done
}}}

Using custom probesets:
{{{
cd ~/datasets/bova_metastasis/rna-seq/tophat_alignments
sam count -b ~/organisms/homo_sapiens/ensembl_68/exons.composite.with_chr.bed *.bam
}}}
